hero.title: Manage your family budget
hero.description: Track expenses, plan goals and make financial decisions as a family. Simple app for joint money management.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.description: Manage your budget anytime and from anywhere. No time or location restrictions.

sync.title: Instant synchronization
sync.description: All changes are instantly displayed to all family members. No delays or data loss.

backup.title: Automatic backup
backup.description: Your data is automatically saved to the cloud. Never lose important financial information.

analytics.title: Smart analytics
analytics.description: Get personalized recommendations and forecasts based on your financial habits.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Our platform is completely free for all users, with no hidden fees or subscriptions

crossPlatform.title: Cross-platform
crossPlatform.description: Clear and simple pricing. Always know what you'll pay for.

planning.title: Joint planning
planning.description: All family members can participate in budget planning and expense tracking

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Automatic expense categorization and smart tips

smartAnalytics.title: Smart analytics
smartAnalytics.description: Detailed reports and charts will help you understand where your money goes

familyGoals.title: Family goals
familyGoals.description: Set common financial goals and track progress towards achieving them

history.title: Our story
history.description: A hackathon brought us together. Before that day we were strangers, but energy and a common goal quickly made us a team. It was at that moment that the idea was born that became our product.
